articles.title: Inside Mirakl's agentic commerce vision
articles.summary: Mirakl is pioneering "agentic commerce", a revolutionary approach that empowers businesses to create personalized, AI-driven shopping experiences. This innovative vision enables companies to connect with customers through intelligent, autonomous agents that learn and adapt to their needs. By leveraging agentic commerce, businesses can unlock new levels of customer engagement and loyalty.

articles.title: Funding grants for new research into AI and mental health
articles.summary: Researchers have been awarded funding grants to explore the intersection of AI and mental health, aiming to develop innovative solutions to improve diagnosis, treatment, and support. This new research has the potential to revolutionize mental health care by leveraging AI's capabilities in data analysis and pattern recognition. The grants will enable scientists to investigate AI-powered tools and therapies that can enhance patient outcomes and overall well-being.

articles.title: OpenAI and NORAD team up to bring new magic to “NORAD Tracks Santa”
articles.summary: OpenAI has partnered with NORAD to enhance the "NORAD Tracks Santa" program, leveraging AI technology to create a more immersive and interactive experience for children tracking Santa's journey on Christmas Eve. This collaboration aims to bring new magic to the beloved holiday tradition, which has been a staple for over 60 years. With AI-powered features, the program promises to deliver a more engaging and personalized experience for kids worldwide.

articles.title: Accenture and OpenAI accelerate enterprise AI success
articles.summary: Accenture has partnered with OpenAI to help businesses accelerate their AI adoption and drive enterprise success. This collaboration aims to enable companies to harness the power of AI and achieve tangible results, leveraging OpenAI's cutting-edge technology and Accenture's expertise in AI implementation. By combining their strengths, Accenture and OpenAI are poised to revolutionize the way enterprises approach AI innovation and transformation.

articles.title: OpenAI takes an ownership stake in Thrive Holdings to accelerate enterprise AI adoption
articles.summary: OpenAI has taken an ownership stake in Thrive Holdings, a move aimed at accelerating the adoption of artificial intelligence in enterprise settings. This partnership is expected to enable Thrive to leverage OpenAI's cutting-edge technology, driving innovation and growth in the industry. By combining forces, the two companies seek to make AI more accessible and effective for businesses worldwide.

articles.title: AlphaFold: Five years of impact
articles.summary: AlphaFold, a revolutionary AI protein-folding model, has made significant impacts in the scientific community over the past five years, accelerating drug discovery and advancing our understanding of biology. Its ability to accurately predict protein structures has enabled breakthroughs in fields such as medicine and biotechnology. By streamlining the protein-folding process, AlphaFold has opened up new avenues for research and innovation, transforming the field of structural biology.

articles.title: Revealing a key protein behind heart disease
articles.summary: Researchers have identified a key protein that plays a crucial role in the development of heart disease, paving the way for potential new treatments. This breakthrough discovery could lead to more effective therapies for preventing and managing cardiovascular conditions. By targeting this specific protein, scientists may be able to reduce the risk of heart disease and improve patient outcomes.

articles.title: How we’re bringing AI image verification to the Gemini app
articles.summary: Gemini is integrating AI-powered image verification into its app, enabling users to instantly verify the authenticity of images and detect potential deepfakes. This innovative feature utilizes machine learning algorithms to analyze images and provide a trust score, enhancing user safety and security. By leveraging AI, Gemini aims to stay ahead of emerging threats and provide a more secure experience for its users.

articles.title: Build with Nano Banana Pro, our Gemini 3 Pro Image model
articles.summary: Introducing the Nano Banana Pro, a cutting-edge image model based on the Gemini 3 Pro architecture, allowing developers to build innovative applications with enhanced visual capabilities. This model enables the creation of more realistic and detailed images, opening up new possibilities for AI-powered content generation. With Nano Banana Pro, developers can unlock new levels of creativity and precision in their projects.

articles.title: Introducing Nano Banana Pro
articles.summary: The Nano Banana Pro has been unveiled, boasting impressive specs and features that set it apart from its predecessors. This innovative device promises to revolutionize the way we interact with technology, offering enhanced performance and efficiency. With its cutting-edge design, the Nano Banana Pro is poised to make a significant impact in the tech industry.

articles.title: Transformers v5: Simple model definitions powering the AI ecosystem
articles.summary: The latest Transformers v5 release simplifies model definitions, enabling easier integration and customization of AI models across the ecosystem. This update empowers developers to build and deploy AI applications more efficiently, driving innovation in the field. By streamlining model definitions, Transformers v5 has the potential to accelerate AI adoption and advancement across various industries.

articles.title: Diffusers welcomes FLUX-2
articles.summary: Diffusers has introduced FLUX-2, a new model that enhances the capabilities of its AI-powered diffusion platform. FLUX-2 is expected to bring significant improvements in image and data processing, enabling more efficient and accurate results. This update is set to boost the overall performance of Diffusers, expanding its potential applications in various fields.

articles.title: Continuous batching from first principles
articles.summary: Researchers have introduced a new approach to continuous batching, a technique that enables more efficient processing of data in artificial intelligence and machine learning models. This method, derived from first principles, aims to optimize batch processing and reduce latency, leading to significant improvements in model performance and training speed. By rethinking traditional batching methods, this innovation has the potential to accelerate AI development and deployment.

articles.title: 20x Faster TRL Fine-tuning with RapidFire AI
articles.summary: RapidFire AI has introduced a breakthrough technology that accelerates TRL (Transformer-based language models) fine-tuning by 20 times, significantly reducing training time and increasing model efficiency. This innovation enables faster deployment of AI models for various applications, such as natural language processing and machine learning. With RapidFire AI, developers can now fine-tune large language models at unprecedented speeds, unlocking new possibilities for AI-driven solutions.

articles.title: Open ASR Leaderboard: Trends and Insights with New Multilingual & Long-Form Tracks
articles.summary: The Open ASR Leaderboard has introduced new multilingual and long-form tracks, enabling researchers to evaluate and improve automatic speech recognition (ASR) systems in diverse languages and longer audio recordings. This update aims to drive innovation in ASR technology, enhancing its accuracy and applicability in real-world scenarios. By expanding the leaderboard's scope, researchers can develop more robust and versatile ASR models that cater to global languages and complex audio inputs.

articles.title: Amazon launches Trainium3
articles.summary: Amazon has launched Trainium3, a new custom-designed AI training chip that promises to accelerate machine learning workloads and improve model performance. This innovation is expected to significantly enhance the capabilities of Amazon's AI services, such as Alexa and SageMaker. With Trainium3, Amazon aims to reduce training times and increase the accuracy of AI models, further solidifying its position in the AI computing market.

articles.title: OpenAI declares 'code red' as Google catches up in AI race
articles.summary: OpenAI has reportedly issued a "code red" alert as Google's AI advancements threaten to surpass its own capabilities, marking a significant shift in the AI race. Google's recent breakthroughs in natural language processing and multimodal models have narrowed the gap with OpenAI, prompting a sense of urgency to accelerate innovation. This development could lead to a new era of competition and innovation in the AI landscape.

articles.title: Qwen3-VL can scan two-hour videos and pinpoint nearly every detail
articles.summary: Qwen3-VL, a cutting-edge AI model, can scan two-hour videos with unprecedented precision, pinpointing nearly every detail, object, and action. This innovation has significant implications for video analysis, enabling efficient and accurate detection of specific events or objects. With Qwen3-VL, applications such as video surveillance, content moderation, and media analysis can be greatly enhanced.

articles.title: Mistral 3 family of models released
articles.summary: The Mistral 3 family of models has been released, offering significant advancements in AI capabilities. This new generation of models boasts improved performance, efficiency, and versatility, enabling developers to build more sophisticated applications. With Mistral 3, users can expect enhanced natural language processing, computer vision, and other AI-powered features.

articles.title: Ecosia: The greenest AI is here
articles.summary: Ecosia, a search engine, has integrated AI technology to enhance its user experience while maintaining its eco-friendly mission. The new AI-powered features aim to provide more accurate search results and personalized recommendations, all while continuing to plant trees with its ad revenue. This innovative approach combines cutting-edge technology with sustainability, setting a new standard for environmentally responsible tech companies.

articles.title: Apple Releases Open Weights Video Model
articles.summary: Apple has released its Open Weights video model, a cutting-edge AI technology that enables the generation of high-quality videos from text prompts. This innovation has the potential to revolutionize video content creation, allowing for more efficient and personalized video production. By making the model open-source, Apple is democratizing access to this technology, enabling developers to build upon and improve it.

articles.title: What will enter the public domain in 2026?
articles.summary: In 2026, works published in 1925 will enter the public domain, making classic literature, music, and films from that year freely available for use and adaptation. This includes notable works like F. Scott Fitzgerald's "The Great Gatsby" and Virginia Woolf's "Mrs. Dalloway". The public domain expansion will enable new creative interpretations and access to these cultural treasures.
